column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Clyde S. Kilby]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Subjects:''' Reply to question on acquiring manuscripts to the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]. The sales of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' in the USA.
*'''Publication:''' Excerpts from the letter have been published in [[SEVEN 27|''SEVEN''
